text: ==Mughal Empire== *Patlipura – Azim-us-Shan ==Oman== * Mombasa – Nasr ibn Abdallah al-Mazru‘i, Wali of Mombasa (1698–1728) ==Ottoman Empire== * Principality of Abkhazia – Jigetshi (1700–1730) ==Portugal== * Angola – *# Bernardino de Tavora de Sousa Távares, Governor of Angola (1701–1702) *# Military junta (1702–1705) * Macau – *# Diogo de Melo Sampaio, Governor of Macau (1700–1702) *# Pedro Vaz de Sequeira, Governor of Macau (1702–1703) Colonial governors Colonial governors 1702
title: List of colonial governors in 1702
